name: @wearenewt/tokenized-time-subgraph
description: This package contains NFT indexing for the Tokenized Time project

scripts.prepare: mustache ./config/${NETWORK:-mumbai}.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run subgraph:codegen
scripts.deploy:hosted:mumbai: NETWORK=mumbai env-cmd npm run prepare && SLUG=wearenewt/tokenized-time-mumbai env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:polygon: NETWORK=polygon env-cmd npm run prepare && SLUG=wearenewt/tokenized-time env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
